moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Steam Client Session Collector.
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will collect Steam session information from an
        account set to autologin.
author: Nikolai Rusakov <nikolai.rusakov@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
